Kansas City Chiefs cornerback Bashaud Breeland was arrested on multiple charges Tuesday in York County, South Carolina, a sheriff's officer said.
Breeland was released from jail late Tuesday night on $2,362.50 bond.
Along with his arrest, a source confirmed… [+2655 chars]

articles.title: Arizona Cardinals look to capitalize on defensive versatility of rookie Isaiah Simmons - ESPN
articles.description: Cardinals defensive coordinator Vance Joseph said rookie Isaiah Simmons will primarily be a linebacker in the Cardinals' 3-4 scheme, but he'll be used in a variety of other roles -- including potentially playing nickel or dime corner or strong safety.
articles.content:
TEMPE, Ariz. -- The Arizona Cardinals already have decided how they're going to use rookie linebacker Isaiah Simmons, but that doesn't mean he'll be tied down to one position.

articles.description: Several new businesses can reopen May 1, but modify operations under Illinois Governor J.B. Pritzker's order.
articles.content: ROCKFORD, Ill. (WIFR) -- Illinois Governor J.B. Prtizker is experiencing pushback from local state politicians after he extended the stay-at-home-order to May 30. However, under his current guidelines as of April 28, some new businesses can partially reopen.… [+2434 chars]

articles.title: How the Chargers have quietly set up their roster for future success - SB Nation
articles.description: Retired NFL lineman Geoff Schwartz thinks the Chargers are a big winner this offseason because of how they’ve built their roster.

articles.title: Tokyo Olympics will be canceled, not delayed, if coronavirus pandemic still poses threat in 2021, top official says - USA TODAY
articles.description: Yoshiro Mori, president of Tokyo 2020, says the Games will not be rescheduled for a second time if they can't be safely held in 2021.
articles.content:
